title: Smart Data Models - ExcST1A
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Modification of an old IEEE ST1A static excitation system without overexcitation limiter (OEL) and underexcitation limiter (UEL).

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be ExcST1A

ilr.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter output current limit reference (Ilr).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

ka.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator gain (Ka).  Typical Value = 190. Default: 0.0

kc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Rectifier loading factor proportional to commutating reactance (Kc). Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0.0

kf.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Excitation control system stabilizer gains (Kf).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

klr.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter output current limiter gain (Klr).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

ta.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator time constant (Ta).  Typical Value = 0.02. Default: 0

tb.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator time constant (Tb).  Typical Value = 10. Default: 0

tb1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator time constant (Tb).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

tc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator time constant (Tc).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

tc1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator time constant (Tc).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

tf.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Excitation control system stabilizer time constant (Tf).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

vamax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum voltage regulator output (Vamax).  Typical Value = 999. Default: 0.0

vamin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum voltage regulator output (Vamin).  Typical Value = -999. Default: 0.0

vimax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum voltage regulator input limit (Vimax).  Typical Value = 999. Default: 0.0

vimin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum voltage regulator input limit (Vimin).  Typical Value = -999. Default: 0.0

vrmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum voltage regulator outputs (Vrmax).  Typical Value = 7.8. Default: 0.0

vrmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum voltage regulator outputs (Vrmin).  Typical Value = -6.7. Default: 0.0

xe.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Excitation xfmr effective reactance (Xe).  Typical Value = 0.04. Default: 0.0
